author: Meaghan Ellis
title: Herschel Walker left out millions in his financial report

sentence: Following a campaign event on Wednesday, Georgia GOP candidate for Senate Herschel Walker said he supports a total abortion ban with no exception for rape, incest, or the health of the mother.
author: Katherine Tangalakis-Lippert
title: Trump-endorsed Senate candidate Herschel Walker supports a total abortion ban: 'there's no exception in my mind'
